title: Kyren Wilson
summary: Kyren Wilson (/ˈkaɪrən/;[3] born 23 December 1991[4]) is an English professional snooker player from Kettering and a four-time ranking event winner. He has been a runner-up at two of the three Triple Crown events, having reached the final at both the 2018 Masters and the 2020 World Snooker Championship. Wilson reached his highest world ranking of fourth in 2020. A prolific breakbuilder, Wilson has made over 300 century breaks and a maximum break on three occasions.
